title: Square and Square Root of a Number
text: If $$n^2=m$$, then $$m$$ is the square of $$n$$. For example, $$8^2=64$$, so $$64$$ is the square of $$8$$. Alternatively, $$\sqrt{64}=8$$.
speech: If  n squared is equal to m , then  m  is the square of  n . For example,  8 squared is equal to 64 , so  64  is the square of  8 . Alternatively,  the square root of 64 is equal to 8 .
pacedSpeech: If   n squared is equal to m
. For example,   8 squared is equal to 64
. Alternatively,   the square root of 64 is equal to 8
